This is a known issue, just one we haven't figured out a good fix for yet. The problem comes from a discrepancy between how our database and card image sources alphabetize - The Hive is the card that throws it all out of whack. Rest assured that we know about and want to fix this bug, though.

title: Fantastic app!
comment: This app pretty much has it all, and for free, it's really quite fantastic.  It has life/poison tracker, mana pool tracker, dice, MoJhoSto (which I'd never heard of until shortly after downloading this program), and most importantly, a smooth, polished card search.  I will say though, unfortunately, the card search is kind of limited (polished, but not fine-tuned), ex: you can only search for matching any or all of your selected colors, not excluding the other colors, or exactly all your chosen colors, and there's no multi-colored only option.  I'd like to see those additional color choices, and if at all possible a separate screen to hand-write the SQL code with my chosen options already populated.  That would just make this app perfect for me, because sometimes I like to do really weird searches.
